headline: Goldman Sachs resumes airline stocks: Delta, United, Alaska Air at Buy
summary: Investing.com -- Goldman Sachs resumed coverage of various U.S. airlines in a note Friday, issuing Buy ratings for Delta Air Lines (NYSE:DAL), United Airlines (UAL), and Alaska Air Group (NYSE:ALK).

raw.headline: Goldman Sachs resumes airline stocks: Delta, United, Alaska Air at Buy

headline: Airline Stocks Could See Their Best Gains in Years. Thanks, Spirit.
summary: Spirit’s woes, and the election of Donald Trump, should give the rest of the industry strong tailwinds.
